thread.title: Cogentix Medical to Announce Second Quarter Fiscal 2016 Results on November 3, 2015
thread.title_full: Cogentix Medical to Announce Second Quarter Fiscal 2016 Results on November 3, 2015

title: Cogentix Medical to Announce Second Quarter Fiscal 2016 Results on November 3, 2015
text:
RSS Navigation Links HOME >> MEDICINE >> TECHNOLOGY Cogentix Medical to Announce Second Quarter Fiscal 2016 Results on November 3, 2015 ... MINNEAPOLIS Oct. 21 2015 /- C...The Company will host a conference call and webcast to discuss these r...An audio replay will be available for 30 days following the call at 85...About Cogentix Medical Cogentix Medical Inc. headquartered in s... http://feeds.bio-medicine.org/latest-medical-technology Date:10/21/2015 
MINNEAPOLIS , Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Cogentix Medical, Inc. (NASDAQ: CGNT ), a global medical device company with innovative and proprietary products serving urology and airway management markets, will release financial results for the second quarter of fiscal year 2016, which ended September 30, 2015 after the market close on Tuesday, November 3, 2015. 
The Company will host a conference call and webcast to discuss these results on Tuesday, November 3, 2015 at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time (3:30 p.m. Central Time). Rob Kill , President and Chief Executive Officer, and Brett Reynolds , Chief Financial Officer, will host the event. Individuals wishing to participate in the conference call should dial 866-410-4406 with the conference ID number 63904451. To access a live webcast of the call, go to the investor relations section of Cogentix Medical's website at ir.cogentixmedical.com. 
An audio replay will be available for 30 days following the call at 855-859-2056 with the conference ID number 63904451. An archived webcast will also be available at ir.cogentixmedical.com. 
About Cogentix MedicalCogentix Medical, Inc., headquartered in Minnetonka, Minnesota , with operations in New York , Massachusetts , The Netherlands and the United Kingdom , is a global medical device company. We design, develop, manufacture and market products for flexible endoscopy with our unique product lines featuring a streamlined visualization system and proprietary sterile disposable microbial barrier, known as EndoSheath technology, providing users with efficient and cost effective endoscope turnover while enhancing patient safety. We also commercialize the Urgent® PC Neuromodulation System, an FDA-cleared device that delivers percutaneous tibial nerve stimulation (PTNS) for the office-based treatment of overactive bladder (OAB). OAB is a chronic condition that affects approximately 42 million U.S. adults. The symptoms include urinary urgency, frequency and urge incontinence. We also offer Macroplastique®, an injectable urethral bulking agent for the treatment of adult female stress urinary incontinence primarily due to intrinsic sphincter deficiency. For more information on Cogentix Medical and our products, please visit us at www.cogentixmedical.com . 'CGNT-G' 
For Further Information: Brett Reynolds , SVP and CFO952-426-6152
